Key Match Events: Domantas Sabonis shot the game-winning basket over Bam Adebayo during the fourth quarter.
The Miami Heat were outscored 37-17 in the third quarter after having a 15-point lead.
Domantas Sabonis secured an offensive rebound and put up the game-winning shot.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Miami Heat lost the rebounding edge in every game this season besides against the Wizards.
The Heat struggled with free throws, making only 71.6 percent this season compared to 80.8 percent in the previous five seasons.
Pelle Larsson took advantage of his first meaningful minutes of the season, finishing with 13 points, two rebounds, and two assists on 66.7 percent shooting and 60 percent from three-point range.
